Command.Name: Common Paths
Command.Title: Common installation paths:
Command.Description:
**dlclist.xml, gameconfig.xml, visualsettings.dat and handling.meta:** mods/update/update.rpf/common/data 
**vehicles.meta:**
mods/update/update.rpf/common/data/levels/gta5 
**carvariations.meta, carcols.meta:** mods/update/x64/dlcpacks/mpchristmas2/dlc/common/data

General information
Do not replace the entire file as this can go wrong.
Instead, copy & paste the desired lines you'd like to change.
